text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item specification information.

Item specification:
JAM Paper & Envelope Wire Edged Holiday Ribbon In Burgundy - 2 1/2 Inches x 9 ft (3 Yards) - sold individually Test

Item specifications:
Luxurious burgundy ribbon
1 roll is 3 Yards - sold individually
Perfect holiday ribbon
Use for crafting, decorating, gift-wrapping, and more
Available in a variety of holiday designs for all your holiday decorating needs
Wire Edge
text.Response A: This GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate is made from 3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror with polished beveled edges. It has a light greenish tint that resembles glass. To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad. The switch plate is 9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high.
text.Response B: This luxurious burgundy ribbon from JAM Paper & Envelope is the perfect addition to your holiday crafting, decorating, and gift-wrapping needs! With its wire edge, this holiday ribbon is easy to work with and adds a touch of elegance to any project. Each roll is 3 yards long and sold individually, so you can choose the amount that's right for you. And with a variety of holiday designs available, you're sure to find the perfect ribbon for all your decorating needs.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

318.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item specification information.

Item specification:
JAM Paper & Envelope Wire Edged Holiday Ribbon In Burgundy - 2 1/2 Inches x 9 ft (3 Yards) - sold individually Test

Item specifications:
Luxurious burgundy ribbon
1 roll is 3 Yards - sold individually
Perfect holiday ribbon
Use for crafting, decorating, gift-wrapping, and more
Available in a variety of holiday designs for all your holiday decorating needs
Wire Edge

Response A

This GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate is made from 3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror with polished beveled edges. It has a light greenish tint that resembles glass. To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad. The switch plate is 9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high.

Response B

This luxurious burgundy ribbon from JAM Paper & Envelope is the perfect addition to your holiday crafting, decorating, and gift-wrapping needs! With its wire edge, this holiday ribbon is easy to work with and adds a touch of elegance to any project. Each roll is 3 yards long and sold individually, so you can choose the amount that's right for you. And with a variety of holiday designs available, you're sure to find the perfect ribbon for all your decorating needs.
